shapes.name: Circle
shapes.description: A circle is a simple closed shape in Euclidean geometry. It is the set of all points in a plane that are at a given distance from a given point, the center.

shapes.name: Triangle
shapes.description: A triangle is a polygon with three edges and three vertices. It is one of the basic shapes in geometry.

shapes.name: Square
shapes.description: A square is a regular quadrilateral, which means that it has four equal sides and four equal angles.
